title: New Linux Variant of Play Ransomware Targeting VMWare ESXi Systems
description: Cybersecurity researchers have discovered a new Linux variant of a ransomware strain known as Play (aka Balloonfly and PlayCrypt) that's designed to target VMWare ESXi environments.
